4.1: Establish and Maintain a Secure Configuration Process Establish and maintain a secure configuration process for enterprise assets v8 (end-user devices, including portable and mobile, non-computing/IoT devices, and ● ● ● servers) and software (operating systems and applications). Review and update documentation annually, or when significant enterprise changes occur that could impact this Safeguard.
5.1: Establish Secure Configurations v7 Maintain documented, standard security configuration standards for all ● ● ● authorized operating systems and software.
